Properties.NoActionMessage: This {{ Workflow.WorkflowType.WorkTerm }} does not currently require your attention.

Properties.Name: Active
Properties.Description: Should Service be used?

Properties.Name: Order
Properties.Description: The order that this service should be used (priority)

Properties.Name: From Email Address|From Attribute
Properties.Description: The email address or an attribute that contains the person or email address that email should be sent from (will default to organization email).

Properties.Name: Send To Email Addresses|To Attribute
Properties.Description: The email addresses or an attribute that contains the person, email address, group or security role that the email should be sent to.

Properties.Name: Send to Group Role
Properties.Description: An optional Group Role attribute to limit recipients to if the 'Send to Email Addresses' is a group or security role.

Properties.Name: Subject
Properties.Description: The subject that should be used when sending email.

Properties.Name: Body
Properties.Description: The body of the email that should be sent.

Properties.Value:
Hey, {{ Person.NickName }}!
This is a friendly reminder that you have an active Baptism Class that is incomplete. Click below to continue where you left off!

Continue Baptism Class



Looking forward to connecting with you soon!


{% assign fromperson = Workflow | Attribute:'NextStepsAdministrativeAssistant','Object' %} {% assign fromemail = fromperson.Email %} {[ signature fromemail:'{{ fromemail }}' ]}
Northside Christian Church
4407 Charlestown Rd, New Albany, IN 47150

Properties.Name: CC Email Addresses|CC Attribute
Properties.Description: The email addresses or an attribute that contains the person, email address, group or security role that the email should be CC'd (carbon copied) to. Any address in this field will be copied on the email sent to every recipient.

Properties.Name: BCC Email Addresses|BCC Attribute
Properties.Description: The email addresses or an attribute that contains the person, email address, group or security role that the email should be BCC'd (blind carbon copied) to. Any address in this field will be copied on the email sent to every recipient.

Properties.Name: Attachment One
Properties.Description: Workflow attribute that contains the email attachment. Note file size that can be sent is limited by both the sending and receiving email services typically 10 - 25 MB.

Properties.Name: Attachment Two
Properties.Description: Workflow attribute that contains the email attachment. Note file size that can be sent is limited by both the sending and receiving email services typically 10 - 25 MB.

Properties.Name: Attachment Three
Properties.Description: Workflow attribute that contains the email attachment. Note file size that can be sent is limited by both the sending and receiving email services typically 10 - 25 MB.

Properties.Name: Save Communication History
Properties.Description: Should a record of this communication be saved to the recipient's profile?

Properties.Description: The attribute that contains the connection request to add an activity to.

Properties.Description: The attribute that contains the activity type to add.

Properties.Description: The note or an attribute that contains the note for the new activity.

Properties.Description: An optional Person attribute that contains the person who is adding the activity.
